title: 1.40 Puzzles of the United Kingdom of the Hebrews
itunes:title: Puzzles of the United Kingdom of the Hebrews
description: Solomon, it is said, wrote books of Wisdom, Psalms, Odes, and a Testament. I discuss these, and then begin my survey of what modern scholarship has to say about the united kingdom. I start with Saul, and wonder why he is treated so differently in the books of Samuel and Chronicles.
content:encoded: Solomon, it is said, wrote books of Wisdom, Psalms, Odes, and a Testament. I discuss these, and then begin my survey of what modern scholarship has to say about the united kingdom. I start with Saul, and wonder why he is treated so differently in the books of Samuel and Chronicles.
itunes:subtitle: The final five books of Solomon introduce Platonism and Solomon as the great magician. It's also time to ask some questions.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens
